maltcms.ui.charts
Class PlotRunner

java.lang.Object
  maltcms.ui.charts.PlotRunner
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConfigurable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<JFreeChart>
Direct Known Subclasses:
EPlotRunner
public class PlotRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<JFreeChart>, IConfigurable

Callable which returns a JFreeChart object. Chart is saved to file, if running in headless mode.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de
